couponTitle: Lulul's Promo: New Customers Save 20% off
couponDescription: 20% Off for New Customers. Available to new customers only, you must be a new Lulus.com account holder and logged into your Lulus account at the time of purchase. Valid for orders shipping outside the United States only.

couponDescription: Take 20% off your first purchase at Lulus. Remember to use this coupon code at checkout.

couponDescription: Explore a wide range of stylish rompers, jumpsuits, and more through the app, all at great deals. Apply this exclusive Lulus discount code for up to 25% off your purchase.
